title: Collaborative Learning Competency Strengthening Course in Blended Learning Environments (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and introductory social science knowledge at the undergraduate level
context.additional_context: A social studies project-based blended learning course for office/administrative professionals, emphasizing online-offline collaborative activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can independently manage over 80% of project milestones by applying self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies in a blended learning environment
Learners can achieve over 90% behavioral engagement (task submission rate) through peer assessment and feedback in collaborative problem-solving processes
Learners can enhance social interaction metrics by over 75% and improve learning outcomes by over 20% using digital collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
